page.title: 08NEW BEACH HOLIDAY CENTRE
page.content: Mr Hostler is the manager of the New Beach Holiday Centre, which has 400 caravans and 89 chalets. Seventy members of staff are needed in Summer but only eight in Winter. As many as 1500 people can stay at any one time. The peak season is from July to August when it costs between Â£100 and Â£120 per chalet or caravan. Entertainment is provided for children such as magic shows, puppet shows, and Punch and Judy. They also have mini-discos at 8pm. There are discos and bands for the older people. This Holiday Centre was the first self-catering camp in this area. In the camp there is a Bingo Hall, gift shop, shopping centre, snack bar and bar. There is a playground for children and a swimming pool with a spiral slide. In Winter a farmer puts his sheep to graze on the land.
